comments:
Description:I got NPE when closing the TPTP JUnit editor. I guess this is a locale common issue.
 
 Build date: Eclipse 3.2 RC4, TPTP 4.2 200606060100, IBM JRE 1.5 SR2

 OS: WindowsXP sp2 Japanese, RHEL4 ja_JP.UTF8 locale

Steps to recreate problem:
        1- create a new JUnit test definition
        2- select "in the code editor" for "Select how the test behavior is edited:", then click Finish
        3- Close the TPTP Test JUnit editor
        
Result: following error stack.
eclipse.buildId=I20060526-0010
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Windows XP x86-32 j9vmwi3223-20060504 (JIT enabled)
J9VM - 20060501_06428_lHdSMR
JIT  - 20060428_1800_r8
GC   - 20060501_AA
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=ja_JP
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -consolelog

Error
Thu Jun 08 17:02:21 JST 2006
An unexpected exception was thrown.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.tools.ui.common.internal.editor.TestSuiteEditorExtension.dispose(TestSuiteEditorExtension.java:44)
